content.body: To be clear, the W3C CSS room that aja pointed out is the same as the CSS IRC channel (the two places are two-way bridged)
content.formatted_body: To be clear, the #w3c_css:matrix.org room that aja pointed out is the same as the CSS IRC channel (the two places are two-way bridged)

content.body: â€¦in other words, you can post messages to whichever place you want, and all your messages will also be seen by everybody in the other place too
